Name: Botany
Des:
[Class Source]
Focused Gathering Products that primarily support Alchemy and Culinary classes in crafting potions and cuisines that enhance combat performance.
Regular Gathering Products are primarily refined through Artisanry​, Weaving, Alchemy, and Culinary classes. Their processed forms become essential resources for crafting gem inlays, gear, clothing dyes, furniture, bait, and other items.

talents.Name: Mushroom Novice
talents.Des: Learn to focus on gathering common mushrooms.

talents.Name: Fruit Novice
talents.Des: Learn to focus on gathering common fruits and vegetables.

talents.Name: Herb Novice
talents.Des: Learn to focus on gathering common herbs.

talents.Name: Spare Gathering Pouch Lv.1
talents.Des: 10% chance to gain 1 extra item when gathering with focus.

talents.Name: Spare Gathering Pouch Lv.2
talents.Des: 20% chance to gain 1 extra item when gathering with focus.
UnlockCondition: Learn Specialization Spare Gathering Pouch Lv.1

talents.Name: Spare Gathering Pouch Lv.3
talents.Des: 30% chance to gain 1 extra item when gathering with focus.
UnlockCondition: Learn Specialization Spare Gathering Pouch Lv.2

talents.Name: Mushroom Pro
talents.Des: Learn to focus on gathering uncommon mushrooms.

talents.Name: Fruit Pro
talents.Des: Learn to focus on gathering uncommon fruits and vegetables.

talents.Name: Herb Pro
talents.Des: Learn to focus on gathering uncommon herbs.

talents.Name: Mushroom Master
talents.Des: Learn to focus on gathering rare mushrooms.

talents.Name: Fruit Master
talents.Des: Learn to focus on gathering rare fruits and vegetables.

talents.Name: Herb Master
talents.Des: Learn to focus on gathering rare herbs.

talents.Name: Faster Gathering Lv.1
talents.Des: Reduces gathering time to 3s.
UnlockCondition: Learn Specialization Spare Gathering Pouch Lv.1

talents.Name: Faster Gathering Lv.2
talents.Des: Reduces gathering time to 2s.

weeklyQuests.QuestDetail: Submit the required materials to Gaido for generous rewards.

Name: Gemology

[Class Source]
Focused Gathering Products primarily used by the Gemcrafting class to craft gem inlays for gear.
Regular Gathering Products are primarily refined through Gemcrafting, Alchemy, and Culinary classes. Their processed forms become essential resources for crafting gear, dye sprays, furniture, cuisine, toys, and other items.

Name: Alchemy
Des:
[Class Source]
The Focus Recipe is primarily used for crafting Healing Aromatics, transformation potions, and dye sprays. The materials required for crafting these items are primarily sourced from Botany and Gemology classes.
Basic Recipe is primarily used for crafting homestead construction materials, Plants, pottery furniture, glass furniture, toys, and other items intended for non-trading purposes. The required materials are primarily gathered through the Botany and Gemology classes, or further processed via the Alchemy class.

talents.Name: Herbal Knowledge Lv.1
talents.Des: Learn to craft Healing Aromatic using Snowflake Parsley.

talents.Name: Herbal Knowledge Lv.2
talents.Des: Learn to craft Healing Aromatic using Pink Musk. Recovery effect may improve.

talents.Name: Herbal Knowledge Lv.3
talents.Des: Learn to craft Healing Aromatic using Whispering Orchid. Recovery effect may greatly improve.

Name: Artisanry​
Des:
[Class Source]
The Focus Recipe is mainly used to craft key materials like Instant-Ignition Carbon Powder for foundry refinement and gem wax for gem processing. The materials required for crafting these items are primarily sourced from Botany and Artisanry​ classes.
The Basic Recipe is primarily used for crafting certain weapons, homestead construction materials, wooden furniture, and other items. Crafting materials are primarily acquired through exchanges with Artisanry​ tutors, harvested via Botany class, and further refined through Artisanry​, Alchemy, Smelting, and other classes.

talents.Name: Burning Powder Crafting
talents.Des: Learn to craft Burning Powder.

talents.Name: Gem Wax Crafting
talents.Des: Learn to craft Gem Wax.

talents.Name: Fast-Burning Powder Crafting
talents.Des: Learn to craft Fast-Burning Powder Crafting.

talents.Name: Artisanry​ Mastery Lv.1
talents.Des: Gain 2 extra items when crafting Burning Powder or Gem Wax.

talents.Name: Artisanry​ Mastery Lv.2
talents.Des: Gain 5 extra items when crafting Burning Powder or Gem Wax. Gain 1 extra item when crafting Fast-Burning Powder.

talents.Name: Quick Crafting
talents.Des: Reduces crafting time to 3s.

talents.Name: Ultra-fast Crafting
talents.Des: Reduces crafting time to 2s.

Name: Culinary​
Des:
[Class Source]
Focus Recipe includes attribute-enhancing cuisine and Mega Cheer-Up Treats. The materials required for crafting these items are primarily sourced from Botany and Fishing classes.
Basic Recipe can be used to craft bait, Fertilizer, and other items. The materials required for crafting these items are primarily gathered through the Botany and Fishing classes, or further precesssed via the Culinary class.

Name: Gemcrafting
Des:
[Class Source]
The Focus Recipe is primarily used for crafting Ruby and Sapphire. The materials required for crafting these items are primarily sourced from Gemology and Artisanry​ classes.
Basic Recipe is primarily used for crafting accessory-type gear, homestead construction materials, stone furniture, decorative gems, etc. The materials required for crafting these items are primarily gathered through the Gemology class, or further processed via the Gemcrafting, Smelting, Alchemy, and other classes.

talents.Name: Gemstone Processing
talents.Des: Learn to craft basic socketable gems from various raw stones.

talents.Name: Pear Cut Lv.2

Name: Smelting
Des:
[Class Source]
The Focus Recipe is primarily used for crafting Mystery Metals and Radiant Stones. The materials required for crafting these items are primarily sourced from Mineralogy and Artisanry​ classes.
Basic Recipe is primarily used for crafting certain weapons, heavy armor, homestead construction materials, and metal furniture, and other items. The materials required for crafting these items are primarily gathered through the Mineralogy class, or further processed via the Smelting, Gemcrafting, Alchemy, and other classes.

Name: Weaving
Des:
[Class Source]
The Focus Recipe is primarily used to craft vibrant Dyes that infuse garments with rich color. The materials required for crafting are primarily sourced from Botany and Alchemy classes.
Basic Recipe is primarily used for crafting medium armor, light armor, charm, homestead construction materials, cloth/leather furniture, etc. The materials required for crafting are primarily sourced from Botany, gathering, and hunting classes, or further processed via the Weaving, Culinary, and Smelting classes.
